name: Flux Caves Demo
detailed_description:
Your spaceship has crashed on a foreign planet...and there are many challenges and surprises to overcome!
Fix the energy pipes so that enough fuel can reach your spare spaceship, and you'll be able to fly away.

The goal of Flux Caves is for the player to have a peace of mind at the end of a hard day. In this game, there is no losing or dying; here, you can discover peaceful caves and open-world puzzles, all while listening to soothing music and working your brain muscles.

In the Demo version, you can try out the 4 starting puzzles. If you decide to buy the full version, your save will be carried over to the full game, so you don't have to start again.

Game runtime is 100-120 minutes.
about_the_game:

Fix the energy pipes so that enough fuel can reach your spare spaceship, and you'll be able to fly away.

In the Demo version, you can try out the 4 starting puzzles. If you decide to buy the full version, your save will be carried over to the full game, so you don't have to start again.

short_description: Flux Caves is a 3D puzzle game. My plan is to create something which can be a challenge, but still you enjoy to play. I want to create a soothing environment and this is enhanced by slow piano-based music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A8-5600 or similar i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: 2,3 Ghz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: 3,5 Ghz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
